<h2 align="center">PHP Path is a PHP library that provides utilities for handling file paths.</h2>
<h3 align="center">It is based on <a href="https://nodejs.org/api/path.html">Node.js's path module.</a></h3>



## Installation

```shell
composer require okapi/path
```



# Usage

```php
<?php

use Okapi\Path\Path;

// Resolve

$path = Path::resolve('./path/to/file.txt');
// --> /project/path/to/file.txt

$path = Path::resolve([
    './path/to/file.txt',
    '../project2/file.txt',
]);
// [0] --> /project/path/to/file.txt
// [1] --> /project2/file.txt



// Join

$path = Path::join('/project', 'path', 'to', 'file.txt');
// --> /project/path/to/file.txt
```



## Testing

- Run `composer run-script test`<br>
  or
- Run `composer run-script test-coverage`
